newsitem.title: USA: AMBAC qualifies three issues for insurance.
newsitem.headline: AMBAC qualifies three issues for insurance.

text.p: AMBAC Indemnity Corp said it qualified for insurance three bond issues slated for sale today.
--Burlington, N.J., $26 million of improvement bonds, $2 million of improvement bonds, $3.4 million of improvement bonds and $19.5 million of improvement bonds.
--Tonawanda, N.Y., $4.5 million of public improvement bonds.
